intent_atoms.description: Create comprehensive integration test suite for FoundationUI components (Badge, Card, KeyValueRow) across iOS and macOS platforms.
Test coverage ≥80% for core FoundationUI components.
All tests pass on iOS 17+ and macOS 14+.
Each test file contains detailed documentation of coverage areas and test counts.
Test files follow project coding standards, One File — One Entity principle, and TDD/XP/PDD methodologies.
All created test files are syntactically correct and ready for execution.
Component initialization tests must validate default and custom parameters across all combinations.
Semantic/property tests must verify enum cases, property values, design tokens, and string serialization.
View rendering tests must confirm non‑nil body and platform-specific rendering.
Accessibility tests must cover labels, VoiceOver compatibility, and platform features.
AgentDescribable protocol tests must validate component type identification, properties serialization, and semantic description generation.
Test suite organized into separate files per component following One File — One Entity principle.
Tests written using TDD, XP, and PDD practices to ensure maintainability and coverage.

functional_units.name: BadgeComponentTests
functional_units.description: Unit tests validating Badge component initialization, semantics, rendering, platform compatibility, protocol conformance, real-world usage, edge cases, and property equality

functional_units.name: CardComponentTests
functional_units.description: Unit tests covering Card component initialization, elevation levels, corner radius variations, material backgrounds, rendering, content types, platform compatibility, protocol conformance, nested cards, real-world usage, and elevation property equality

functional_units.name: KeyValueRowComponentTests
functional_units.description: Unit tests for KeyValueRow component initialization, layout options, text content variations, copyable functionality, rendering, platform compatibility, protocol conformance, real-world usage, edge cases, layout recommendations, and combinations testing

functional_units.name: FoundationUIIntegrationTests
functional_units.description: Integration tests ensuring FoundationUI module import, component availability, design token access, and cross-platform compatibility
